properties.name: anchor-params.mail-address
properties.description: E-mail address commonly used in this application.

properties.name: application.charset
properties.description: Character set used by this application.

properties.name: application.aop-method-logging
properties.description: Whether to output the log at the start and end of the Java method.

properties.name: application.content.page-size
properties.description: Number of records per page to display on the content pages.

properties.name: application.content.download-file-name
properties.description: The name of the file to download.

properties.name: application.logging.mail.to-address
properties.description: E-mail address to send e-mail when an exception occurs.

properties.name: application.logging.mail.from-address
properties.description: Email address of the sender of the email when an exception occurs.

properties.name: application.logging.mail.subject
properties.description: Subject of email when exception occurs.
